description:
Ludum Dare 51 Submission

A game about unfortunate bots stuck in endless, looping patterns of inputs, and one special bot’s surprising power to control them. Can they defeat all the challenges ahead of them? You might be their only hope!

Instructions:

  • Get all bots to their goal matching the same color.
  • You control the blue bot which receives a new input every second.
  • Every 10 seconds, a new red bot is created programmed with the last 10 inputs. It will loop these inputs forever.
  • Bots self-destruct if they determine they are stuck.
  • [WASD] or [Arrows] to move. Hold down the desired input to register it.
  • Registered and programmed inputs show up as icons above the bot.

See how far you can get and have fun!

Made with Godot

Note: Audio not by us
